languages.text: {n}Взгляд Идиры немного проясняется, а улыбка становится чуть шире.{/n} "Спасибо, Лорд-капитан! Я знала, что вы меня в беде не бросите! Как только почую, что мы где-то рядом, мигом вам весточку пошлю".

traits.locale_text: {n}Взгляд Идиры немного проясняется, а улыбка становится чуть шире.{/n} "Спасибо, Лорд-капитан! Я знала, что вы меня в беде не бросите! Как только почую, что мы где-то рядом, мигом вам весточку пошлю".

languages.text: {n}Some of the darkness in Idira's eyes clears, and her smile widens slightly.{/n} "Thank you, Lord Captain! I knew you wouldn't leave me in a bind! As soon as I sense we're close, I'll let you know right away."
languages.original_text: {n}Взгляд Идиры немного проясняется, а улыбка становится чуть шире.{/n} "Спасибо, Лорд-капитан! Я знала, что вы меня в беде не бросите! Как только почую, что мы где-то рядом, мигом вам весточку пошлю".

traits.locale_text: {n}Some of the darkness in Idira's eyes clears, and her smile widens slightly.{/n} "Thank you, Lord Captain! I knew you wouldn't leave me in a bind! Once we're somewhere nearby, I'll sense it and send word right away."

{n}Some of the darkness in Idira's eyes clears, and her smile widens slightly.{/n} "Thank you, Lord Captain! I knew you wouldn't leave me in a bind! Once we're somewhere nearby, I'll sense it and send word right away."

{n}Some of the darkness in Idira's eyes clears, and her smile widens slightly.{/n} "Thank you, Lord Captain! I knew you wouldn't leave me in a bind! As soon as I sense we're close, I'll let you know right away."

{n}Some of the darkness in Idira's eyes clears, and her smile widens slightly.{/n} "Thank you, Lord Captain! I knew you wouldn't leave me in a bind! As soon as I sense we're close, I'll let you know right away."

{n}Some of the darkness in Idira's eyes clears, and her smile widens slightly.{/n} "Thank you, Lord Captain! I knew you wouldn't leave me in a bind! As soon as I sense we're close, I'll let you know right away."

languages.text: {n}伊迪拉眼中的一部分黑暗消失了，她的微笑变得更明亮了一些。{/n}“谢谢你，舰长大人！我就知道你不会将我丢在困境之中！只要我感觉到我们接近目的地了，我就立刻通知你。”
languages.original_text: {n}Some of the darkness in Idira's eyes clears, and her smile widens slightly.{/n} "Thank you, Lord Captain! I knew you wouldn't leave me in a bind! As soon as I sense we're close, I'll let you know right away."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊迪拉眼中的一部分黑暗消失了，她的微笑变得更明亮了一些。{/n}“谢谢你，舰长大人！我就知道你不会将我丢在困境之中！只要我感觉到我们接近目的地了，我就立刻通知你。”

languages.text: {n}Parte de la oscuridad en los ojos de Idira se disipa, y su sonrisa se amplía ligeramente.{/n} «¡Gracias, Lord Capitán! ¡Sabía que no me abandonaría cuando más l{mf|e|a} necesito! L{mf|e|a} informaré en cuanto nos acerquemos».
languages.original_text: {n}Some of the darkness in Idira's eyes clears, and her smile widens slightly.{/n} "Thank you, Lord Captain! I knew you wouldn't leave me in a bind! As soon as I sense we're close, I'll let you know right away."

traits.locale_text: {n}Parte de la oscuridad en los ojos de Idira se disipa, y su sonrisa se amplía ligeramente.{/n} «¡Gracias, Lord Capitán! ¡Sabía que no me abandonaría cuando más l{mf|e|a} necesito! L{mf|e|a} informaré en cuanto nos acerquemos».

languages.text: {n}Ein Teil der Dunkelheit weicht aus Idiras Augen und ihr Lächeln wird etwas breiter.{/n} "Danke, Lord Captain! Ich wusste, Ihr würdet mich nicht im Stich lassen! Sobald ich spüre, dass wir in der Nähe sind, lasse ich es Euch wissen."
languages.original_text: {n}Some of the darkness in Idira's eyes clears, and her smile widens slightly.{/n} "Thank you, Lord Captain! I knew you wouldn't leave me in a bind! As soon as I sense we're close, I'll let you know right away."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein Teil der Dunkelheit weicht aus Idiras Augen und ihr Lächeln wird etwas breiter.{/n} "Danke, Lord Captain! Ich wusste, Ihr würdet mich nicht im Stich lassen! Sobald ich spüre, dass wir in der Nähe sind, lasse ich es Euch wissen."

languages.text: {n}イディラの目の闇がいくらか晴れ、わずかに微笑みも広がった。{/n}「ありがとう、ロード・キャプテン！きっとあたいを見捨てるような人じゃないって思ってたわ！近づいていると感じたら、すぐに知らせるわね」
languages.original_text: {n}Some of the darkness in Idira's eyes clears, and her smile widens slightly.{/n} "Thank you, Lord Captain! I knew you wouldn't leave me in a bind! As soon as I sense we're close, I'll let you know right away."

traits.locale_text: {n}イディラの目の闇がいくらか晴れ、わずかに微笑みも広がった。{/n}「ありがとう、ロード・キャプテン！きっとあたいを見捨てるような人じゃないって思ってたわ！近づいていると感じたら、すぐに知らせるわね」

languages.text: {n}Le regard d'Idira se fait moins désespéré et son sourire s'élargit légèrement.{/n} « Merci, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ! Je savais que vous ne me laisseriez pas tomber. Je vous informerai immédiatement dès que nous en serons assez proches. »
languages.original_text: {n}Some of the darkness in Idira's eyes clears, and her smile widens slightly.{/n} "Thank you, Lord Captain! I knew you wouldn't leave me in a bind! As soon as I sense we're close, I'll let you know right away."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le regard d'Idira se fait moins désespéré et son sourire s'élargit légèrement.{/n} « Merci, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ! Je savais que vous ne me laisseriez pas tomber. Je vous informerai immédiatement dès que nous en serons assez proches. »

languages.text: {n}İdira'nın gözlerindeki karanlığın aydınlığa kavuşmasıyla gülümsemesi biraz da olsa büyüyor.{/n} "Teşekkür ederim Lord Kaptan! Beni zor durumda bırakmayacağını biliyordum! Yaklaştığımızı hissedince sana hemen haber vereceğim."
languages.original_text: {n}Some of the darkness in Idira's eyes clears, and her smile widens slightly.{/n} "Thank you, Lord Captain! I knew you wouldn't leave me in a bind! As soon as I sense we're close, I'll let you know right away."

traits.locale_text: {n}İdira'nın gözlerindeki karanlık, aydınlığa kavuşuyor ve gülümsemesi biraz da olsa büyüyor.{/n} "Teşekkür ederim Lord Kaptan! Beni zor durumda bırakmayacağını biliyordum! Yaklaştığımızı hissedince sana hemen haber vereceğim."
